Excitations

class pyrit.excitation.Excitations(*excis: Exci)

Bases: object

Container class that collects all excitations of a problem.

Constructor of Exciations

Parameters

excis (Exci) – A number of instances of Exci

Methods

add_exci

Add a number of Excis

delete_exci

Delete a number of Excis specified by their IDs

get_exci

Get a specific Exci

get_exci_from_name

Get a specific Exci from its name.

get_exci_id_from_name

Get the ID of a specific Exci from its name.

get_ids

Get the IDs of all stored Excis

update

Update a value to a name.

Attributes

is_constant

Returns True if all excitations are constant.

is_fcc

Returns True if it contains any exci of type FieldCircuitCoupling

is_homogeneous

Returns True if all excitations are homogeneous.

is_linear

Returns True if all excitations are linear.

is_time_dependent

Returns True if at least one excitation is time dependent.
add_exci(*excis: Exci) → None

Add a number of Excis

Parameters

excis (Exci) – A number of instances of Exci

Return type

None

delete_exci(*IDs: int) → None

Delete a number of Excis specified by their IDs

Parameters

IDs (int) – The IDs

Return type

None

get_exci(ID: int) → Exci

Get a specific Exci

Parameters

ID (int) – The ID of the requested Exci

Returns

exci – An Exci

Return type

Exci

get_exci_id_from_name(name: str) → int

Get the ID of a specific Exci from its name.

The ID of the first Exci with the given name is returned. If multiple Exci’s with the same name are present, a warning is given.

Parameters

name (str) – The name of the requested Exci

Returns

id – The ID of the Exci with the given name

Return type

int

get_exci_from_name(name: str) → Exci

Get a specific Exci from its name. The first Exci with the given name is returned.

Parameters

name (str) – The name of the requested Exci

Returns

exci – The Exci with the given name

Return type

Exci

get_ids() → List[int]

Get the IDs of all stored Excis

Returns

ids – A list of all IDs

Return type

List[int]

property is_fcc: bool

Returns True if it contains any exci of type FieldCircuitCoupling

update(name: str, val: Any)

Update a value to a name.

Calls the function pyrit.excitation.Exci.update() on every excitation.

Parameters

  • name (str) – The name of the field to update.

  • val (Any) – The value to update.
